title: Energy, Electric Vehicles, And The Economy (Podcast)
itunes:title: Energy, Electric Vehicles, And The Economy (Podcast)
description:
Liz Young, Head of Investment Strategy at SoFi, joins the show to talk energy and investing in risk assets. Josh Aviv, CEO of Sparkcharge, discusses charging stations for electric vehicles and the EV market. Matt Miller and Guy Johnson interview Polestar CEO Thomas Ingenlath after the company merges with a SPAC to go public. Vince Cignarella, Global Macro Strategist with Bloomberg News, and Barry Ritholtz, host of “Masters in Business,” discuss the Fed balance sheet and what’s driving inflation. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
